item.title: Graph RAG for Security: Insights from a Microsoft Intern
item.description: In Gartner’s 2024 Impact Radar, Knowledge Graphs were highlighted as a transformative technology—on par with Generative AI. With Gartner predicting that AI agents will augment or automate 50% of business decisions by 2027, I was curious to see how graph-based reasoning could be applied to cybersecurity. What is Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG)? Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) is a process that enhances large language models (LLMs) by including relevant information from a knowledge base in its responses.
